Parameters.NAME: Aidaptive
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: Aidaptive is an AI-powered predictive personalization engine designed to boost revenue and conversions for eCommerce and hospitality brands.
Parameters.KEY FEATURES:
Personalized recommendations: Uses machine learning to tailor product recommendations, pricing, search results, and merchandising
Jarvis ML technology: Provides enterprise-grade machine learning for businesses of all sizes
Integration: Works with various data sources, such as Shopify, Guesty, Salesforce, and BigCommerce
Parameters.USE CASES:
eCommerce brands seeking to enhance customer experience with personalized product recommendations
Hospitality businesses aiming to offer tailored services for improved customer satisfaction
Marketing teams looking to automate the process of predicting the best products to promote

Parameters.NAME: Botika
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: Botika is an AI-powered software platform designed to help online apparel retailers create hyper-realistic clothing product photos.

Parameters.NAME: Cala
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: Design, produce, and deliver custom fashion products
Parameters.KEY FEATURES: CALA makes it easy to design, produce, and deliver your own fully-custom fashion products. CALA provides everything you could need. Design assistance. Material sourcing. Sampling. With powerful features like in-app notifications, task management, and real-time commenting â€” so you can maximize productivity in the studio or on the go.

Parameters.NAME: ChefGPT
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: ChefGPT is an AI-powered personal chef designed to simplify meal planning and cooking.

Parameters.NAME: CreativAI
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: CreativAI has truly been a game-changer for our business. Their advanced technology and seamless integration have made it easier for us to accomplish our daily tasks.
Parameters.KEY FEATURES: CreativAI is a writing tool made to automate and customize your content generation process plus make the writing process efficient, enjoyable, and productive for everyone.

Parameters.NAME: EzeGym
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: EzeGym's comprehensive feature set includes membership management, scheduling and appointment booking, attendance tracking, payment processing, along with reporting and analytics.

Parameters.NAME: FashionAdvisorAI
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: FashionAdvisor.AI is an AI-powered tool utilizing GPT3 technology to provide instant answers to fashion-related questions.

Parameters.NAME: GymGenie
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: GymGenie is an AI-powered web application that provides customized workout routines based on individual gym goals. It utilizes advanced algorithms and machine learning techniques to generate personalized exercise plans, offering a unique and convenient solution for people looking to achieve their fitness goals. With its innovative approach and growing demand for accessible fitness solutions, GymGenie presents a great opportunity for individuals looking to enter the health and wellness space.

Parameters.NAME: Hair by AI
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: Hair by AI is an AI-powered hairstyle assistant designed to help women find their perfect look.

Parameters.NAME: Imgcreator
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: ImgCreator.AI is an AI-powered generator and designer, for AI anime, AI photo, background generation and even room design.
Parameters.KEY FEATURES:
Generate hyper realistic background for anything
AI Design your room to any style in seconds
Turn your photo to anime character
Use AI Studio to generate couple photos of any two random people
Create design and edit images in AI Designer
Generate anime character in certain pose using text
Parameters.USE CASES:
Designers and artists seeking a tool to generate illustrations or concept designs
Content creators in need of unique images for their projects
Businesses looking to create custom visuals for marketing materials

Parameters.NAME: Lumiere 3D
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: Lumiere3D is a state-of-the-art AI platform designed to help businesses create captivating cinematic videos for e-commerce and marketing in just minutes.
Parameters.KEY FEATURES:
AI Operator: Dynamic camera movements, seamless transitions, and personalized effects
Smart Scanner: Transform objects into virtual 3D masterpieces with lifelike models
AI Music: Generate professional-quality, royalty-free tunes effortlessly
3D Scenes: Elevate product presentation with breathtaking cinematic videos
Parameters.USE CASES:
Create unique cinematic shoe videos for platforms like YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, and TikTok
Bring your vision to life with high-quality object scanning and 3D modeling
Elevate your shoe video content with dynamic camera angles and animations
Experience dynamic lighting and scene changes with AI-powered features
Boost your shoe sales with visually stunning videos

Parameters.NAME: Make My Workout
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: Make My Workout is an AI-driven tool developed by CNP that generates personalized workout plans based on user input. It considers factors such as physical condition, preferences, and goals to provide tailored exercise routines. The tool offers a variety of exercises, difficulty levels, and detailed information for each exercise, along with reminders and tracking features to help users stay on track.

Parameters.NAME: MealPractice
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: MealPractice's AI Recipe Generator is a user-friendly tool that empowers users to effortlessly create custom recipes.

Parameters.NAME: PPLEGPT
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: PPLeGPT is an AI-powered tool that generates personalized workout routines in seconds, acting as a personal fitness assistant.

Parameters.NAME: ProductBot
Parameters.DESCRIPTION: GiftBot is an AI-powered product expert and recommender designed to help users decide what to buy.
